类 TreeBuilder

extends java.lang.Object
    Build tree priors given vocabulary and word associations
    作者:
    Weiwei Yang

    • 方法详细资料

      • build2LevelTree

        public void build2LevelTree​(java.lang.String scoreFileName,
                            java.lang.String vocabFileName,
                            java.lang.String printTreeFileName,
                            int numTop)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Build a two-level tree
        参数:
        scoreFileName - The word association file name
        vocabFileName - The vocabulary file name
        printTreeFileName - The tree file name
        numTop - The number of child nodes per internal node
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • hac

        public void hac​(java.lang.String scoreFileName,
                java.lang.String vocabFileName,
                java.lang.String printTreeFileName,
                double threshold)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Build a tree using hierarchical agglomerative clustering
        参数:
        scoreFileName - The word association file name
        vocabFileName - The vocabulary file name
        printTreeFileName - The tree file name
        threshold - The threshold of association confidence: words with an association lower than the threshold are randomly paired and inserted (to avoid super long paths)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • hacWithLeafDup

        public void hacWithLeafDup​(java.lang.String scoreFileName,
                           java.lang.String vocabFileName,
                           java.lang.String printTreeFileName,
                           double threshold)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Build a tree using hierarchical agglomerative clustering with leaf duplication
        参数:
        scoreFileName - The word association file name
        vocabFileName - The vocabulary file name
        printTreeFileName - The tree file name
        threshold - The threshold of association confidence: words with an association lower than the threshold are randomly paired and inserted (to avoid super long paths)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • printTree

        public void printTree​(java.lang.String printTreeFileName,
                      TLDATopicPriorNode root)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Write the tree to a file in human-readable format
        参数:
        printTreeFileName - The tree prior file name
        root - The root node
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
